creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Panel of imperial yellow satin brocade. All-over design of five-clawed dragons and Heavenly Jewel in gold and red alternating with loosely drawn clouds in shades of blue, gery, green, mulberry, pink, apricot and pale tan. Entire color scheme of great delicacy. Border of diapered brocade in pink and rose, bound with medium blue silk. Lining of brick colored silk with floral spray pattern.
title: Panel
